meanings.definition: Something that is visually striking or impressive.
meanings.sent1: The fireworks display was an eyepopper at the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The new art exhibit featured several eyepoppers that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The bright pink unicorn costume was an eyepopper at the costume party.
meanings.sent4: The sunset over the ocean was an eyepopper, painting the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The giant rainbow balloon was an eyepopper at the parade, floating high above the crowd.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that attracts attention or stands out.
meanings.sent1: The movie star was an eyepopper on the red carpet with her stunning gown.
meanings.sent2: The unique vintage car was an eyepopper at the car show.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot was an eyepopper at the pet store, amusing all the customers.
meanings.sent4: The skyscraper was an eyepopper in the city skyline, towering above all other buildings.
meanings.sent5: The rare flower was an eyepopper in the garden, its vibrant colors drawing everyone's gaze.
